clips.title: Clips to Extract
clips.description: A list of clips to extract from the video, in JSON format. Maximum 20 clips per run, each clip maximum 10 minutes duration.

maxRetries.title: Maximum Retry Attempts
maxRetries.description: Maximum number of retry attempts for failed downloads

quality.title: Video Quality & Pricing Tier
quality.description: Choose video quality tier. Starting Oct 9, 2025: you pay only for the quality actually delivered. Before then: flat $0.09 rate.

enableFallbacks.title: Enable Fallback Methods
enableFallbacks.description: Allow expensive fallback processing if primary method fails. May incur additional charges ($0.09 per fallback) but significantly improves success rate for difficult videos. Disable for guaranteed pricing with lower success rate.

useCookies.title: Use YouTube Cookies
useCookies.description: Check this box to enable the use of YouTube cookies for the download. The cookies from the field below will only be used if this is checked.

cookies.title: YouTube Cookies Content
cookies.description: Use only if you get "Video unavailable" or "Sign in to confirm" errors. Get cookies using browser extensions: [Chrome](https://chrome.google.com/webstore/detail/get-cookiestxt-locally/cclelndahbckbenkjhflpdbgdldlbecc) or [Firefox](https://addons.mozilla.org/en-US/firefox/addon/cookies-txt/). Leave empty if downloads work without errors.

proxy.title: Proxy Configuration
proxy.description: Proxy is enabled by default for maximum reliability. Use if you get rate limiting (429) or IP blocking errors. See [Apify Proxy documentation](https://docs.apify.com/platform/proxy) for details.
